docs.snippet: Mr. Tillerson, Exxon Mobil’s chief executive and a secretary of state candidate, has a relationship with Russia that could be both a strength and his Achilles’ heel....
docs.lead_paragraph: Mr. Tillerson, Exxon Mobil’s chief executive and a secretary of state candidate, has a relationship with Russia that could be both a strength and his Achilles’ heel.
docs.abstract: Political strategists and energy experts assess Exxon Mobile chairman Rex W Tillerson as potential candidate for secretary of state.

headline.main: Rex Tillerson, an Aggressive Dealmaker Whose Ties With Russia May Prompt Scrutiny
headline.print_headline: A State Dept. Candidate  Steeped in Oil and Deals

docs.snippet: Why would President-elect Trump object to a thorough, bipartisan probe into Russian meddling?...
docs.lead_paragraph: Why would President-elect Trump object to a thorough, bipartisan probe into Russian meddling?
docs.abstract: Editorial argues Pres-elect Donald J Trump has obligation to encourage further investigation into Russia's possible tampering with 2016 presidential election, evidence of which he has emphatically denied, in order to restore public's faith in American electoral system and his own victory.

docs.snippet: The president-elect said that he did not believe assessments that Russia had intervened to help him, widening a breach with intelligence agencies....
docs.lead_paragraph: The president-elect said that he did not believe assessments that Russia had intervened to help him, widening a breach with intelligence agencies.
docs.abstract: Pres-elect Trump says Democrats embarrassed about losing are behind American intelligence reports about Russians intervening to help his election; tells Fox News Sunday interviewer he doubts reports because intelligence agencies involved in investigation disagree on hacking details; Trump's statements serve to widen rift between president-elect and American intelligence community.

headline.main: Trump Links C.I.A. Reports on Russia to Democrats’ Shame Over Election
headline.print_headline: Trump Links C.I.A. Reports on Russia to Democrats’ Shame Over Election

docs.snippet: President-elect Donald Trump rejected as "ridiculous" U.S. intelligence reports that Russia intervened in the presidential election on his behalf through targeted hacking, putting him at odds with top lawmakers who vowed to investigate the finding...
docs.lead_paragraph: President-elect Donald Trump rejected as "ridiculous" U.S. intelligence reports that Russia intervened in the presidential election on his behalf through targeted hacking, putting him at odds with top lawmakers who vowed to investigate the findings.

headline.main: Trump Says Reports Russia Helped Him in U.S. Election Are 'Ridiculous'

docs.snippet: The central question facing Exxon Mobil Corp Chief Executive Rex Tillerson if he becomes U.S. secretary of state is whether a lifelong oil man with close ties to Russia can pivot from advancing corporate interests to serving the national interest....
docs.lead_paragraph: The central question facing Exxon Mobil Corp Chief Executive Rex Tillerson if he becomes U.S. secretary of state is whether a lifelong oil man with close ties to Russia can pivot from advancing corporate interests to serving the national interest.
